The launch details & timing will be released in a blog post before #devcon5. We’ll be focused on widely needed reference data like BTC/USD price and closely collaborating with @compoundfinance, @synthetix_io and other great teams to create a high quality reference data resource.
The increasing availability of reliable market data feeds will benefit all Ethereum DeFi users.  We're excited to provide input and help Chainlink launch these 7 new price feeds.
